comment: I honestly would never tell someone to take this professor. He is rude and will just randoly break out into stories that have nothing to do with the subject matter. Sounds like what i would imagine to be Abe Lincoln

Under no circumstances take this professor!!! He literally is the epitomy of a HORRIBLE professor! To sum things up, he can barely hear a thing you say, barely knows his facts, and is just a complete dumbass. His tests are completely random and he doesnt help you study at all AND he often insults students for asking him to repeat something.
